languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Останки могли бы быть переработаны в трупный крахмал, а помещения переоборудованы для служб судна".
"This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Останки могли бы быть переработаны в трупный крахмал, а помещения переоборудованы для служб судна".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. The remains can be processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."
"This statement is true. The remains can be processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."
"This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

"This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."
"This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Überreste ließen sich zu Leichenstärke verarbeiten, und die Räumlichkeiten umgewidmet werden, so dass sie die Systeme des Schiffs beherbergen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Überreste ließen sich zu Leichenstärke verarbeiten, und die Räumlichkeiten umgewidmet werden, so dass sie die Systeme des Schiffs beherbergen."

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Les restes pourraient être recyclés en fécule de cadavre, et les lieux réaménagés pour accueillir les systèmes du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Les restes pourraient être recyclés en fécule de cadavre, et les lieux réaménagés pour accueillir les systèmes du vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Los restos podrán procesarse para preparar almidón de cadáveres, y el local podría reasignarse para alojar sistemas de la nave».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Los restos podrán procesarse para preparar almidón de cadáveres, y el local podría reasignarse para alojar sistemas de la nave».

languages.text: 「そのとおりだ。遺体はコープススターチに加工し、船内のシステムを収容するために改修することができる」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりだ。遺体はコープススターチに加工し、船内のシステムを収容するために改修することができる」

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。这些遗骸可以加工成尸体淀粉，这间墓室也可以进行改造，用来容纳舰船的系统组件。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。这些遗骸可以加工成尸体淀粉，这间墓室也可以进行改造，用来容纳舰船的系统组件。”

languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Kalıntılar, ceset nişastasına dönüştürme işleminde fayda sağlayabilir. Mülkler de gemi sistemlerini barındırmaya uygun hâle getirildi."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The remains could be usefully processed into corpse starch, and the premises refitted to house the vessel's systems."
